name: txid
description: Transaction ID that created this UTXO

name: block_height
description: Block height where UTXO was created

name: script_type
description: Script type (p2pkh, p2sh, p2wpkh, p2wsh, etc.)

name: spent
description: Whether this UTXO has been spent

name: spent_txid
description: Transaction ID that spent this UTXO

name: spent_block_height
description: Block height where UTXO was spent

name: lifespan_blocks
description: Number of blocks UTXO existed before being spent

name: is_coinbase
description: Whether this UTXO came from a coinbase transaction
